description: This file defines an Angular component 'DeviceSearchComponent' that provides a user interface for device search, assurance, diagnostics, and related tools. It includes mock data for device info, lists for assurance and diagnostics, and methods to handle user interactions such as starting tests, navigating back, and selecting items.

classes.name: DeviceSearchComponent
classes.description: Angular component providing a device search and diagnostics UI with mock data and interaction handlers.

methods.name: startTest
methods.description: Triggers the diagnostics test with selected configuration, currently logs details to console.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Navigates back to the previous page using Angular's Location service.

methods.name: clearSearch
methods.description: Clears the global search input field.

methods.name: onGlobalSearchInput
methods.description: Handles input change in the search box, updating the search query state.
